item.title: Cheaper Connections To The Cloud
item.description:
Businesses are often quick to celebrate the cost savings of cloud services compared to maintaining their own data centers. However, there’s a hidden cost that often catches them off guard: cloud connectivity. The current cost of bandwidth depends on a company’s blend of LAN, MAN, and WAN traffic. Businesses with data centers located in the same building as their employees usually find most of their application traffic stays on the LAN...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cheaper-connections-to-the-cloud/
